segments.text: Welcome to our university ’ s fifties anniversary , Sir . Please have a seat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Wow , your school has so many honors . Congratulations !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excuse me . I wonder see Dean Mr . Lee first . I was wondering if could you tell me where his office is ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . Mr . Lee ’ s office building at the south end of the campus , just beside the library .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me show you the way . Please follow me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much . It ’ s very kind of you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s up on the second floor . You have to use the stairs . The elevator isn ’ t working .
segments.speaker: S1
